trans-unit.source: Represents the Advice element specified in [Saml2Core, 2.6.1].
This information may be ignored by applications without affecting either the semantics or the validity of the assertion.
[Saml2Core, 2.6.1] For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice.AssertionIdReferences%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice.Assertions%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Advice.AssertionUriReferences%2A> properties are all initialized with empty collections.
Gets the collection of assertions referenced by ID.
The contents of the AssertionIDRef elements contained in this Advice element.
A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id"></xref> that contains IDs that reference the assertions.
Gets the collection of assertions specified by value.
The contents of the Assertion elements contained in this Advice element.
A collection of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Assertion"></xref> that contains the assertions.
Gets the collection of assertions referenced by URI.
The contents of the AssertionURIRef elements contained in this Advice element.
A collection of type <xref:System.Uri> that contains URIs that reference the assertions.
